briefTitle: A Non-Comparative Study to Assess the Safety of MabThera (Rituximab) in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis.
officialTitle: Multicenter Non-Comparative Expanded Access Program of to Assess Safety of Rituximab (Mab Anti Cd-20) in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis (Ser)
summary: This single arm study will assess the safety of MabThera plus methotrexate in patients with rheumatoid arthritis who have had a lack of response to 1-5 DMARDs or biological agents. Patients will receive MabThera (1g i.v.) on days 1 and 15, concomitantly with methotrexate \>=15mg p.o./week. The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months, and the target sample size is 100-500 individuals.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Any Adverse Event, Any Serious Adverse Event, and Death
